ovdesc.p: This application defines setup specific to a particular derivatives exchange.
An exchange is any entity through which you can trade a product, or alternatively a grouping device for OTC trades.
For example all OTC trades should be traded on a OTC exchange setup in T24.
Keys to this table are numeric.

This field is used in conjunction with the field DAY.TRADE. The Exchange cut off time is stored in this field. This time is expressed based on the server time zone. If the exchange is located in a different time zone, then the time needs to be converted to server time and updated here. This cut off time would be used for creating a consolidated trade for multiple partial fills. Fills happening after the cut off time will be considered for the next day’s trade. .

This field is used in conjunction with the field CUT.OFF.TIME. When set to YES , multiple fills before the cut off time, will be consolidated and a single trade will be created. The trade price would be weighted average price of each fill. The consolidated trade would be created at the cut off time. If the fill (execution) happens after the cut off time, then that fill be considered for the next day’s consolidated trade. If the order is fully filled before the cut off time, then the consolidated trade would be created immediately. The consolidation would be broker wise in case of a multiple broker scenario, i.e. only fills of a particular broker would be consolidated, therefore the number of trades would be equal to the number of brokers.
Allowed values are YES and NO.
